briefTitle: Revisiting Omental Transposition in Locally Advance and Locally Recurrent Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Revisiting Omental Transposition in Locally Advance and Locally Recurrent Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* The patients with omental transposition operation within King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital
* More than 18 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* The patients with refusal
